description: Vocabulary from the 準備級一級 level from the document《華語八千詞》published by the Steering Committee for the Test Of Proficiency-Huayu (SC-TOP).

deck.question: 我
deck.comment: [N] I; me; my

deck.question: 你
deck.comment: [N] you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])

deck.question: 他
deck.comment: [N] he or him; (used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant); (used before sb's name for emphasis); (used as a meaningless mock object); other; another

deck.question: 我們
deck.comment: [N] we; us; ourselves; our

deck.question: 你們
deck.comment: [N] you (plural)

deck.question: 他們
deck.comment: [N] they

deck.question: 您
deck.comment: [N] you (courteous, as opposed to informal 你[ni3])

deck.question: 誰
deck.comment: [N] who; also pr. [shui2]

deck.question: 人
deck.comment: [N] man; person; people; CL:個[ge4],位[wei4]

deck.question: 中國
deck.comment: [N] China

deck.question: 美國
deck.comment: [N] United States; USA; US

deck.question: 日本
deck.comment: [N] Japan; Japanese

deck.question: 台灣
deck.comment: [N] variant of 臺灣[Tai2 wan1]; Taiwan

deck.question: 名字
deck.comment: [N] name (of a person or thing); CL:個[ge4]

deck.question: 家
deck.comment: [N] see 傢伙[jia1 huo5]; surname Jia; home; family; (polite) my (sister, uncle etc); classifier for families or businesses; refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China; noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian; CL:個[ge4]

deck.question: 電話
deck.comment: [N] telephone; CL:部[bu4]; phone call; CL:通[tong1]; phone number

deck.question: 現在
deck.comment: [N] now; at present; at the moment; modern; current; nowadays

deck.question: 今年
deck.comment: [N] this year

deck.question: 今天
deck.comment: [N] today; at the present; now

deck.question: 明天
deck.comment: [N] tomorrow

deck.question: 昨天
deck.comment: [N] yesterday

deck.question: 早上
deck.comment: [N] early morning; CL:個[ge4]

deck.question: 上午
deck.comment: [N] morning; CL:個[ge4]

deck.question: 中午
deck.comment: [N] noon; midday; CL:個[ge4]

deck.question: 下午
deck.comment: [N] afternoon; CL:個[ge4]; p.m.

deck.question: 晚上
deck.comment: [N] evening; night; CL:個[ge4]; in the evening

deck.question: 一
deck.comment: [N] one; 1; single; a (article); as soon as; entire; whole; all; throughout; "one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1); also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

deck.question: 二
deck.comment: [N] two; 2; (Beijing dialect) stupid

deck.question: 三
deck.comment: [N] surname San; three; 3

deck.question: 四
deck.comment: [N] four; 4

deck.question: 五
deck.comment: [N] five; 5

deck.question: 六
deck.comment: [N] six; 6

deck.question: 七
deck.comment: [N] seven; 7

deck.question: 八
deck.comment: [N] eight; 8

deck.question: 九
deck.comment: [N] nine; 9

deck.question: 十
deck.comment: [N] ten; 10

deck.question: 零
deck.comment: [N] zero; nought; zero sign; fractional; fragmentary; odd (of numbers); (placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one); fraction; (in mathematics) remainder (after division); extra; to wither and fall; to wither

deck.question: 兩
deck.comment: [N] two; both; some; a few; tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)

deck.question: 時候
deck.comment: [N] time; length of time; moment; period

deck.question: 百
deck.comment: [N] surname Bai; hundred; numerous; all kinds of

deck.question: 半
deck.comment: [N] half; semi-; incomplete; (after a number) and a half

deck.question: 爸爸
deck.comment: [N] (informal) father; CL:個[ge4],位[wei4]

deck.question: 媽媽
deck.comment: [N] mama; mommy; mother; CL:個[ge4],位[wei4]

deck.question: 哥哥
deck.comment: [N] older brother; CL:個[ge4],位[wei4]

deck.question: 弟弟
deck.comment: [N] younger brother; CL:個[ge4],位[wei4]

deck.question: 姊姊
deck.comment: [N] older sister; Taiwan pr. [jie3 jie5]

deck.question: 妹妹
deck.comment: [N] younger sister; young woman; CL:個[ge4]

deck.question: 的
deck.comment: [Ptc] of; ~'s (possessive particle); (used after an attribute); (used to form a nominal expression); (used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis); see 的士[di1 shi4]; really and truly; aim; clear

deck.question: 第
deck.comment: [Det] (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc); order; (old) rank in the imperial examinations; mansion; (literary) but; just

deck.question: 分
deck.comment: [M] to divide; to separate; to distribute; to allocate; to distinguish (good and bad); part or subdivision; fraction; one tenth (of certain units); unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm; minute (unit of time); minute (angular measurement unit); a point (in sports or games); 0.01 yuan (unit of money); part; share; ingredient; component

deck.question: 點
deck.comment: [M] point; dot; drop; speck; o'clock; point (in space or time); to draw a dot; to check on a list; to choose; to order (food in a restaurant); to touch briefly; to hint; to light; to ignite; to pour a liquid drop by drop; (old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]; dot stroke in Chinese characters; classifier for items

deck.question: 個
deck.comment: [M] individual; this; that; size; classifier for people or objects in general; variant of 個[ge4]

deck.question: 歲
deck.comment: [M] variant of 歲[sui4], year; years old; classifier for years (of age); year; year (of crop harvests)

deck.question: 年
deck.comment: [M] surname Nian; year; CL:個[ge4]; grain; harvest (old); variant of 年[nian2]

deck.question: 住
deck.comment: [V] to live; to dwell; to stay; to reside; to stop; (suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

deck.question: 來
deck.comment: [V] to come; to arrive; to come round; ever since; next

deck.question: 是
deck.comment: [Vst] is; are; am; yes; to be; variant of 是[shi4]; (used in given names)

deck.question: 姓
deck.comment: [Vst] family name; surname; CL:個[ge4]; to be surnamed

deck.question: 覺得
deck.comment: [Vst] to think; to feel

deck.question: 喜歡
deck.comment: [Vst] to like; to be fond of

deck.question: 打電話
deck.comment: [Vi] to make a telephone call

deck.question: 高興
deck.comment: [Vs] happy; glad; willing (to do sth); in a cheerful mood

deck.question: 漂亮
deck.comment: [Vs] pretty; beautiful

deck.question: 高
deck.comment: [Vs] surname Gao; high; tall; above average; loud; your (honorific)

deck.question: 好
deck.comment: [Adv] good; well; proper; good to; easy to; very; so; (suffix indicating completion or readiness); (of two people) close; on intimate terms; (after a personal pronoun) hello; to be fond of; to have a tendency to; to be prone to

deck.question: 很
deck.comment: [Adv] (adverb of degree); quite; very; awfully

deck.question: 真
deck.comment: [Adv] really; truly; indeed; real; true; genuine

deck.question: 電腦
deck.comment: [N] computer; CL:臺[tai2]

deck.question: 老師
deck.comment: [N] teacher; CL:個[ge4],位[wei4]

deck.question: 買
deck.comment: [V] to buy; to purchase

deck.question: 忙
deck.comment: [Vs] busy; hurriedly; to hurry; to rush

deck.question: 學生
deck.comment: [N] student; schoolchild

deck.question: 大學
deck.comment: [N] the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism; university; college; CL:所[suo3]

deck.question: 學校
deck.comment: [N] school; CL:所[suo3]

deck.question: 字
deck.comment: [N] letter; symbol; character; word; CL:個[ge4]; courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

deck.question: 筆
deck.comment: [N] pen; pencil; writing brush; to write or compose; the strokes of Chinese characters; classifier for sums of money, deals; CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

deck.question: 學
deck.comment: [V] to learn; to study; to imitate; science; -ology

deck.question: 問
deck.comment: [V] to ask

deck.question: 說
deck.comment: [V] to persuade; to speak; to say; to explain; to scold; to tell off; a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說 heliocentric theory)

deck.question: 寫
deck.comment: [V] to write

deck.question: 聽
deck.comment: [V] smile (archaic); to listen; to hear; to obey; a can (loanword from English "tin"); classifier for canned beverages; (literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule; to sentence; to allow

deck.question: 練習
deck.comment: [V] to practice; exercise; drill; practice; CL:個[ge4]

deck.question: 能
deck.comment: [Vaux] surname Neng; can; to be able to; might possibly; ability; (physics) energy

deck.question: 可以
deck.comment: [Vaux] can; may; possible; able to; not bad; pretty good

deck.question: 上課
deck.comment: [V-sep] to go to class; to attend class; to go to teach a class

deck.question: 知道
deck.comment: [Vst] to know; to become aware of; also pr. [zhi1 dao5]

deck.question: 電視
deck.comment: [N] television; TV; CL:臺[tai2],個[ge4]

deck.question: 水
deck.comment: [N] surname Shui; water; river; liquid; beverage; additional charges or income; (of clothes) classifier for number of washes

deck.question: 再
deck.comment: [Adv] again; once more; re-; second; another; then (after sth, and not until then)

deck.question: 書
deck.comment: [N] abbr. for 書經[Shu1 jing1]; book; letter; document; CL:本[ben3],冊[ce4],部[bu4]; to write

deck.question: 電影
deck.comment: [N] movie; film; CL:部[bu4],片[pian4],幕[mu4],場[chang3]

deck.question: 以前
deck.comment: [N] before; formerly; previous; ago

deck.question: 以後
deck.comment: [N] after; later; afterwards; following; later on; in the future

deck.question: 走
deck.comment: [V] to walk; to go; to run; to move (of vehicle); to visit; to leave; to go away; to die (euph.); from; through; away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3]); to change (shape, form, meaning)

deck.question: 等
deck.comment: [V] class; rank; grade; equal to; same as; to wait for; to await; et cetera; and so on; et al. (and other authors); after; as soon as; once

deck.question: 看
deck.comment: [V] to look after; to take care of; to watch; to guard; to see; to look at; to read; to watch; to visit; to call on; to consider; to regard as; to look after; to treat (an illness); to depend on; to feel (that); (after verb) to give it a try; Watch out! (for a danger)

deck.question: 什麼
deck.comment: [N] what?; something; anything

deck.question: 朋友
deck.comment: [N] friend; CL:個[ge4],位[wei4]

deck.question: 東西
deck.comment: [N] east and west; thing; stuff; person; CL:個[ge4],件[jian4]

deck.question: 吧
deck.comment: [Ptc] bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc); to puff (on a pipe etc); (onom.) bang; abbr. for 貼吧[tie1 ba1]; (modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise); ...right?; ...OK?; ...I presume.

deck.question: 呢
deck.comment: [Ptc] particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?"); particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?"); particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?"); (at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action; particle indicating strong affirmation; woolen material

deck.question: 嗎
deck.comment: [Ptc] see 嗎啡, morphine; (question particle for "yes-no" questions)

deck.question: 找
deck.comment: [V] to try to find; to look for; to call on sb; to find; to seek; to return; to give change

deck.question: 做
deck.comment: [V] to do; to make; to produce; to write; to compose; to act as; to engage in; to hold (a party); to be; to become; to function (in some capacity); to serve as; to be used for; to form (a bond or relationship); to pretend; to feign; to act a part; to put on appearance

deck.question: 再見
deck.comment: [Vi] goodbye; see you again later

deck.question: 怎麼樣
deck.comment: [Vs] how?; how about?; how was it?; how are things?

deck.question: 叫
deck.comment: [Vst] to shout; to call; to order; to ask; to be called; by (indicates agent in the passive mood); variant of 叫[jiao4]

deck.question: 謝謝
deck.comment: [Vst] to thank; thanks; thank you

deck.question: 對不起
deck.comment: unworthy; to let down; I'm sorry; excuse me; pardon me; if you please; sorry? (please repeat)

deck.question: 請問
deck.comment: Excuse me, may I ask...?

deck.question: 這
deck.comment: [Det] this; these; (commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)

deck.question: 那
deck.comment: [Det] surname Na; surname Nuo; variant of 哪[na3]; that; those; then (in that case); commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing; (archaic) many; beautiful; how; old variant of 挪[nuo2]

deck.question: 公共汽車
deck.comment: [N] bus; CL:輛[liang4],班[ban1]

deck.question: 車
deck.comment: [N] surname Che; car; vehicle; CL:輛[liang4]; machine; to shape with a lathe; war chariot (archaic); rook (in Chinese chess); rook (in chess)

deck.question: 到
deck.comment: [V] to (a place); until (a time); up to; to go; to arrive; (verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

deck.question: 去
deck.comment: [V] to go; to go to (a place); (of a time etc) last; just passed; to send; to remove; to get rid of; to reduce; to be apart from in space or time; to die (euphemism); to play (a part); (when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth; (after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker); (used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

deck.question: 回
deck.comment: [V] to circle; to go back; to turn around; to answer; to return; to revolve; Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims); time; classifier for acts of a play; section or chapter (of a classic book); to curve; to return; to revolve; variant of 迴[hui2]

deck.question: 坐
deck.comment: [Vi] surname Zuo; to sit; to take a seat; to take (a bus, airplane etc); to bear fruit; variant of 座[zuo4]

deck.question: 開車
deck.comment: [V-sep] to drive a car

deck.question: 錢
deck.comment: [N] surname Qian; coin; money; CL:筆[bi3]; unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩[liang3]

deck.question: 多少
deck.comment: [N] number; amount; somewhat; how much; how many; which (number); as much as

deck.question: 給
deck.comment: [V] to; for; for the benefit of; to give; to allow; to do sth (for sb); (grammatical equivalent of 被); (grammatical equivalent of 把); (sentence intensifier); to supply; to provide

deck.question: 給
deck.comment: [Prep] to; for; for the benefit of; to give; to allow; to do sth (for sb); (grammatical equivalent of 被); (grammatical equivalent of 把); (sentence intensifier); to supply; to provide

deck.question: 貴
deck.comment: [Vs] expensive; noble; precious; (honorific) your

deck.question: 便宜
deck.comment: [Vs] convenient; cheap; inexpensive; small advantages; to let sb off lightly

deck.question: 大
deck.comment: [Vs] big; huge; large; major; great; wide; deep; older (than); oldest; eldest; greatly; very much; (dialect) father; father's elder or younger brother; see 大夫[dai4 fu5]

deck.question: 小
deck.comment: [Vs] small; tiny; few; young

deck.question: 難
deck.comment: [Vs] difficult (to...); problem; difficulty; difficult; not good; disaster; distress; to scold

deck.question: 容易
deck.comment: [Vs] easy; likely; liable (to)

deck.question: 有
deck.comment: [Vst] to have; there is; there are; to exist; to be

deck.question: 想
deck.comment: [Vst] to think; to believe; to suppose; to wish; to want; to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

deck.question: 幾
deck.comment: [Det] small table; almost; how much; how many; several; a few

deck.question: 塊
deck.comment: [M] lump (of earth); chunk; piece; classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc; (coll.) classifier for money and currency units

deck.question: 飯
deck.comment: [N] food; cuisine; cooked rice; meal; CL:碗[wan3],頓[dun4]

deck.question: 吃
deck.comment: [V] to eat; to consume; to eat at (a cafeteria etc); to eradicate; to destroy; to absorb; to suffer; to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2]); variant of 吃[chi1]

deck.question: 請
deck.comment: [V] to ask; to invite; please (do sth); to treat (to a meal etc); to request

deck.question: 也
deck.comment: [Adv] surname Ye; also; too; (in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation

deck.question: 不
deck.comment: [Adv] (negative prefix); not; no

deck.question: 沒
deck.comment: [Adv] (negative prefix for verbs); have not; not; drowned; to end; to die; to inundate

deck.question: 都
deck.comment: [Adv] surname Du; all; both; entirely; (used for emphasis) even; already; (not) at all; capital city; metropolis

deck.question: 只
deck.comment: [Adv] only; merely; just; but; variant of 只[zhi3]; grain that has begun to ripen; variant of 衹[zhi3]; variant of 只[zhi3]; classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc

deck.question: 可是
deck.comment: [Conj] but; however; (used for emphasis) indeed

deck.question: 還是
deck.comment: [Conj] or; still; nevertheless; had better

deck.question: 了
deck.comment: [Ptc] (modal particle intensifying preceding clause); (completed action marker); to finish; to achieve; variant of 瞭[liao3]; to understand clearly; (of eyes) bright; clear-sighted; to understand clearly; unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]

deck.question: 得
deck.comment: [Ptc] to obtain; to get; to gain; to catch (a disease); proper; suitable; proud; contented; to allow; to permit; ready; finished; structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc; to have to; must; ought to; to need to

deck.question: 過
deck.comment: [Ptc] surname Guo; to cross; to go over; to pass (time); to celebrate (a holiday); to live; to get along; excessively; too-; (experienced action marker)
